testcase.name: To validate login functionality with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Adactin Hotel login page...................................passed When User enter valid username and password.................................passed And User click login button.................................................passed When User select "London","Hotel Creek","Standard","1","2","2"and Click SearchButton.passed And User select the hotel and click continue................................passed And User enters "pranav","raj","chennai","2345673425432723","VISA","Feb","2022","098"and click book now.passed Then User should be in confirmation page....................................passed

testcase.name: To validate login functionality with valid username and valid password 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Adactin Hotel login page...................................passed When User enter valid username and password.................................passed And User click login button.................................................passed When User select "NewYork","Hotel Hervey","Double","1","2","2"and Click SearchButton.passed And User select the hotel and click continue................................passed And User enters "Sheela","Mathiyazhagan","Madurai","5678902879065432","AmericanExpress","May","2022","065"and click book now.passed Then User should be in confirmation page....................................passed
